message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at $12,000. I believe it holds significant value for you.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $9,000 for it.
Bob, thanks for your offer. I'm willing to come down a bit, but $9,000 is too low. How about $11,000?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $10,500 for the product.
